issue.title: [CF 1082] Tell if a spell has been cast recently
issue.body:
Hey Cy. Got a stumped problem here I am hoping you can help me with.

I use "Spell Cast = Absent/Present" to tell if I am casting a spell, (eg: chaos bolt with a long cast time, or immolate since the debuff does not show until I finish casting) so I can prepare the next icon to show. The other case is an instant cast spell, eg: Affliction, where I can test if a debuff has been applied to the target. These work fine.

Here's my problem - two examples come to mind Immedietly: Serpent Sting (Surv Hunter), Hand of Gul'dan (Demo Lock). These are instant cast, but due to long animation time they do not show a debuff on the target immedietly. The solution that comes to mind is to be able to basically condition "Spell has been cast within the last X seconds".

Is this possible, or do you have another solution already that I missed?

Thanks a lot!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1082 | Raw

comments.body:
Use a Combat Event icon with a Timer notification.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
